Name: Halt
About the game: Halt is a survival horror game that will take you into a world of terrible dreams, nightmares and monsters. You will find yourself in the place of a detective who is investigating complicated cases about the disappearance of people during sleep. In the game you have to save ammo, hide and try to find a way out of this damned world. Features: detective action, decisions with consequences, pixel art from HELLOWEIS.
Meta Description: Looking for information on Halt? Check out the release date (Nov 19, 2022), developer insights from 8BITLAB, and a complete game summary.
